snippet: The latest Quinnipiac University poll shows that President Obama and Mitt Romney are essentially tied in Florida and Ohio, while the president leads in Pennsylvania.
abstract: The latest Quinnipiac University poll shows that President Obama and Mitt Romney are essentially tied in Florida and Ohio, while the president leads in Pennsylvania.

headline.main: A Tight Race in Swing States
headline.print_headline: The Swing States: Polling Neck and Neck
